Issues not containing the minimum requirements will be closed:

- Issues without a description (using the header is not good enough) will be closed.
- Issues without debug logging will be closed.
- Issues without configuration will be closed

-->

## Debug log

<!-- To enable debug logs:
1. Go to Settings → Devices & Services → Integrations
2. Find DiUS Powersensor and click on it
3. Click the three dots menu → Enable Debug Logging
4. OR add this to your configuration.yaml:
   logger:
     default: warning
     logs:
       custom_components.dius: debug
5. Reproduce the issue and copy the logs below
-->
